title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Heatstroke
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A hardcore ultra-marathoner dies of hyperthermia in a hostel with no air conditioning during a record heat wave, his elite athlete's confidence becoming the very thing that kills him.

death_teaser: His body was a temple. The heat made it a crematorium.
